text: On August 4, 2023, a Twitch streamer, named Kai Cenat announced a huge giveaway, to take place at Union Square in Manhattan, New York City. Over 5,000 people went to Manhattanâ€™s Union Square for the giveaway that did not go as planned. It was a Friday afternoon, with some people climbing onto vehicles, throwing chairs and punching other people. Police struggled to control the chaos. ==References== Category:2020s riots Category:2023 crimes in the United States Category:2020s in New York City Category:Riots in the United States Category:August 2023 events
title: 2023 Union Square riot
